Having a tough time landing a job interview? Try thisâ€¦Create some â€œcareer case studiesâ€Impactful moments in your career where youâ€™ve solved BIG problemsMaybe youâ€™re a sales person who multi threaded your way to a huge closeMaybe youâ€™re a marketer who increased MQLs by a country mile Maybe youâ€™re a devops engineer who decreased downtime or improved deployment cycles Maybe youâ€™re an HRBP who solved organizational design challenges â€¦.you get the idea Brain dump what you accomplished then condense it Challenge: 1-2 sentences describing the problem Strategy: a few bullet points outlining the actions you took to solve the problem Results: key outcomes from your actions (using numbers if possible!)Put these case studies in a slide deck using Canva with a brief intro on who you are, a slide on why you want to work at the company (avoid fluff, keep it real), and a slide on some problems you think you can solve Send this to the hiring manager with an accompanying 30 second Loom intro And boom. You just did what 99.9% of people donâ€™t doâ€¦.You went above and beyond.You approached with confidence and value. You made yourself UNDENIABLE.That interview is yours. Having a tough time landing a job interview? Try thisâ€¦Create some â€œcareer case studiesâ€Impactful moments in your career where youâ€™ve solved BIG problemsMaybe youâ€™re a sales person who multi threaded your way to a huge closeMaybe youâ€™re a marketer who increased MQLs by a country mile Maybe youâ€™re a devops engineer who decreased downtime or improved deployment cycles Maybe youâ€™re an HRBP who solved organizational design challenges â€¦.you get the idea Brain dump what you accomplished then condense it Challenge: 1-2 sentences describing the problem Strategy: a few bullet points outlining the actions you took to solve the problem Results: key outcomes from your actions (using numbers if possible!)Put these case studies in a slide deck using Canva with a brief intro on who you are, a slide on why you want to work at the company (avoid fluff, keep it real), and a slide on some problems you think you can solve Send this to the hiring manager with an accompanying 30 second Loom intro And boom. You just did what 99.9% of people donâ€™t doâ€¦.You went above and beyond.You approached with confidence and value. You made yourself UNDENIABLE.That interview is yours. Go get â€˜em tiger ğŸ¯- - - - Tag a job seeker who should try this because sharing is caring. - - - - Want to try this but presentation creation not your thing? Try thisâ€¦Create some â€œcareer case studiesâ€Impactful moments in your career where youâ€™ve solved BIG problemsMaybe youâ€™re a sales person who multi threaded your way to a huge closeMaybe youâ€™re a marketer who increased MQLs by a country mile Maybe youâ€™re a devops engineer who decreased downtime or improved deployment cycles Maybe youâ€™re an HRBP who solved organizational design challenges â€¦.you get the idea Brain dump what you accomplished then condense it Challenge: 1-2 sentences describing the problem Strategy: a few bullet points outlining the actions you took to solve the problem Results: key outcomes from your actions (using numbers if possible!)Put these case studies in a slide deck using Canva with a brief intro on who you are, a slide on why you want to work at the company (avoid fluff, keep it real), and a slide on some problems you think you can solve Send this to the hiring manager with an accompanying 30 second Loom intro And boom. Try thisâ€¦Create some â€œcareer case studiesâ€Impactful moments in your career where youâ€™ve solved BIG problemsMaybe youâ€™re a sales person who multi threaded your way to a huge closeMaybe youâ€™re a marketer who increased MQLs by a country mile Maybe youâ€™re a devops engineer who decreased downtime or improved deployment cycles Maybe youâ€™re an HRBP who solved organizational design challenges â€¦.you get the idea Brain dump what you accomplished then condense it Challenge: 1-2 sentences describing the problem Strategy: a few bullet points outlining the actions you took to solve the problem Results: key outcomes from your actions (using numbers if possible!)Put these case studies in a slide deck using Canva with a brief intro on who you are, a slide on why you want to work at the company (avoid fluff, keep it real), and a slide on some problems you think you can solve Send this to the hiring manager with an accompanying 30 second Loom intro And boom.
